full_text: There’s no other cuddle buddy like this soft, knitted Moomin troll. The Moomintroll is started at the top of the head and knitted seamlessly in the round first towards the snout and then down towards the feet. The hands, tail and ears are knitted separately. Size one size Yarn demand Novita Moominhouse (007) Moomintroll 100g Needles and other supplies Needles: 3 mm or the size needed to obtain the correct gauge Designer Sari Nordlund Finished dimensions Height from the feet to top of the head: 28 cm Gauge: 23 sts and 32 rows in stockinette stitch = 10 cm Note: The Moomintroll is started at the top of the head and knitted seamlessly in the round first towards the snout and then down towards the feet. The hands, tail and ears are knitted separately. The eyes and fingers are embroidered on the finished object.
name: Ravelry: Moomin Troll Softie pattern by Novita
